high_descs: Go to the left side of the desk in front of you.
Turn on the lamp in the back, left corner of the desk.
Reach over to the night stand on your left and pick up the pencil on the right edge of the night stand.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a pencil after turning the light on.

high_descs: Walk ahead and slightly left, to the left side of the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
Pick up the pencil on the table to the left of the desk.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a pencil using the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn to the left and then right to face the small table.
Turn on the lamp on the table to the right.
Pick up the pencil from the right side of the small table.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp and pick up a pencil.
